goal.en: This course employs a problem-based learning approach to demonstrate how to apply economic theory to specific business decisions. Throughout the course, extensive real-world business examples will be presented to illustrate how to use economic theory in making business decisions. Calculations, graphs, and spreadsheets are all based on actual markets and real data. Besides, emphases on agency and contract theory, managerial behavioral economics, game theory, and pricing are especially valuable to future managers.
